description:
*This item is included in the “Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy Digital Deluxe Edition” and “Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy Ultimate Edition” sets.

“Summer Adventure!” costume for Ryza that was featured as an early-purchase bonus and “Another Fashion” and “Summer Style” costume sets featured in the Digital Deluxe edition for the previous title. 16 costumes for Ryza, Lent, Tao, and Klaudia, 4 each.

[Costumes included]
Ryza: Summer Adventure!, Midnight Black, Blue Skies, Sunny Smile.
Klaudia: Summer Memories, White Princess, Pure Maiden, Strawberry Parfait.
Lent: Warrior's Day Off, Gothic Wolf, Forest Guardian, Desert Squall.
Tao: Island Explorer, Twilight Raconteur, Wonder Pastel, Book Fairy.

Note:
- Costumes can be changed in the “Changing Room” accessible through the desk in the Atelier. Characters need to join the party before their costumes can be changed.
- Please visit the official website for more information on the featured content: https://www.koeitecmoamerica.com/ryza2/
name: Summer Memories Costume Set
